Invocation Name: tech news daily
des: Have the Alexa tech news daily Skill keep you informed every day with flash briefings, deals of the day, quote of the day, relevant articles, and more. Get the latest tech news daily automatically updated from the Launch Ticker daily tech news newsletter This skill works on all Alexa devices and Alexa enabled smartphones, tablets, and PCs.
